title: Write A Book
description: Are you good at something? Write a book on how you became good at it. Get on Fiverr.com and hire a writer to ghost write for you.

title: Skydive Advertising

title: Start a Vlog
description: If youre good at something, you could start a YouTube channel vlogging about your expertise in action.
